channel.title: Mining Issue 317 [PI]
channel.description: When players mine on my server, as long as they have a pickaxe in their inventory, it shows a dragon pickaxe picking at the rocks. This isn't an issue or anything, I would just like it fixed and i wouldn't know what file to go into to fix it. Also, if the player is wielding a pickaxe, it shows both pickaxes picking at the rocks. How can I make it so that it only shows the pickaxe they are wielding?

item.title: Mining Issue 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The issue with the animation showing both pickaxes can be solved by updating you anims:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/316498-perfect-602-animations-seq-dat.html
(I did similar to this when I had your issue. I already had 602 anims loading, I just needed the new file).

The issue with it showing just your dragon pickaxe, I’d have to see your code. Probably in a file called Mining.java

Read full topic
